front.title: A bibliography of sources of thermodynamic data for the systems
front.abstract: Contained herein is a bibliography of sources of experimental and correlated thermodynamic data for the systems CO2 + NH3 + H2O, CO2 + H2S + H2O, H2S + NH3 + H2O, and CO2 + NH3 + H2S + H2O. The types of data in this bibliography include all types of equilibrium data, including both equilibria in solution and vapor-liquid equilibrium data, enthalpies, heat capacities, and densities. There are 215 references cited.

seriesInfo.name: NBS special publication; NBS special pub; NBS SP
